content: I think I'll start saving for a down payment now, but I'll also make sure to prioritize my other financial goals and not sacrifice my current lifestyle too much. It's a good idea to start building equity and taking advantage of compound interest, and I don't want to wait too long and potentially miss out on a good opportunity to buy a home. However, I'll also make sure to review my budget and adjust my savings rate as needed to ensure I'm not overcommitting myself.
